ConfigurationOption.Value: select wh.wonum, wh.description, p.description, wh.hazardid, wh.siteid, wh.wohazardid, p.precautionid, wp.wohazardprecid, p.precautionuid, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldkey = p.precautionuid and ldownertable = 'PRECAUTION' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext from wohazard wh left outer join wohazardprec wp on wh.wonum = wp.wonum and wh.hazardid = wp.hazardid and wh.siteid = wp.siteid left outer join precaution p on wp.precautionid = p.precautionid and wp.siteid = p.siteid

List.ListEntry: wh.wonum in ( select wonum from workorder where ( wonum in (select lbl.refwo from lbl_labtrans lbl where lbl.lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' ) ) and status in ( select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') ) )
